timeline.bodyText: Could you please add license header here?

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure KitLogger supports format specifiers
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: It does, but using String Formatter placeholders, use following log.info("Updating %s from %s", kind, sourceName);
replies.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: Thanks for your suggestions, I implemented them all.
replies.author: mtrejo
